text: â€œAllah wavumbulutsa nkhani yabwino zedi yomwe ndi buku logwirizana nkhani zake; (losasemphana). Lobwerezabwereza (malamulo ake). Makungu a omwe amaopa Mbuye wawo amanjenjemera ndi ilo. Kenako makungu awo ndi mitima yawo zimakhazikika pokumbukira Allah. Buku limeneli ndi chiongoko cha Allah; ndi ilo, akumuongola amene wamfuna. Ndipo amene Allah wamulekelera kuti asokere (chifukwa chonyozera kwake choona), sangakhale ndi womuongola (ndi ompulumutsa ku chionongeko)
